oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A FINITE-ELEMENT METHOD FOR A DIFFUSION EQUATION WITH CONSTRAINED ENERGY AND NONLINEAR BOUNDARY-CONDITIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PANI, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: specification
subject
mass
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A finite element Galerkin method for a diffusion equation with constrained energy and nonlinear boundary condition is analysed and optimal error estimates in L2 and L(infinity)-norms are derived. These results improve upon previously derived estimates by Cannon et al. [4].
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE AUSTRALIAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY SERIES B-APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 35(), 87-102
